sub_title: Technical lead Front Line Unit bij Flowserve
summary:
Currently I work as a technical lead engineer at Flowserve B.V., Etten-Leur, The Netherlands. By working for Flowserve I have gained over 10 years of professional experience in several aspects of engineering and order fulfillment of pump packages for the oil and gas industry.

Extensive knowledge of (international) oil and gas standards and codes, such as: API 541, 610, 682, 614, 670, 671, ANSI, ASME and products, such as: pumps, seals, seal systems, lube oil systems. Strong experience with Saudi Aramco specifications, familiar with Shell and ExxonMobil specifications.

profile_positions.title: Technical lead Front Line Unit
Lead engineer subsea multiphase pump development project

profile_positions.description: In this function I was developing and designing non-standard centrifugal pump packages on the basis of customer specifications, national and international standards and internal procedures for world wide applications in oil refineries and pipelines. This included reviewing and evaluating customer specifications related to technical acceptability and within the established project budget. Co-ordination and assignment of engineering activities to other engineering functions, such as product engineering, technical support functions and draftsmen was also a major part of the function as well as intensive communication with the contractor/ client.

profile_positions.description: During this period I worked as a mechanical engineer for a variety of industrial design and engineering projects, both within the company and by (external) clients, such as: Flowserve B.V., Tetra Pak, Isover, Tyco valves and controls, Systemate Numafa B.V..
profile_positions.title: Mechanical engineer
